body_html:
@peterjc123 Thanks so much! Will that be soon?

Actually, I found that my building process falls into a loop: it is indeed running but it always shows the same stuff (warnings) again and again; I don't know if it is normal, or I did something wrong? (I did not use Ninja)

The same warning is like:

CUSTOMBUILD : nvcc warning : The -std=c++11 flag is not supported with the configured host compiler. Flag will be ignored. [C:\Users\v-yuclin\workspace\pytorch\torch\lib\build\ATen\src\ATen\ATen.vcxproj] cl : Command line warning D9002: ignoring unknown option '-fexceptions' [C:\Users\v-yuclin\workspace\pytorch\torch\lib\build\ATen\src\ATen\ATen.vcxproj] cl : Command line warning D9002: ignoring unknown option '-fPIC' [C:\Users\v-yuclin\workspace\pytorch\torch\lib\build\ATen\src\ATen\ATen.vcxproj] THCTensorMathCompareTLong.cu cl : Command line warning D9002: ignoring unknown option '-fexceptions' [C:\Users\v-yuclin\workspace\pytorch\torch\lib\build\ATen\src\ATen\ATen.vcxproj] cl : Command line warning D9002: ignoring unknown option '-fPIC' [C:\Users\v-yuclin\workspace\pytorch\torch\lib\build\ATen\src\ATen\ATen.vcxproj] THCTensorMathCompareTLong.cu cl : Command line warning D9002: ignoring unknown option '-fexceptions' [C:\Users\v-yuclin\workspace\pytorch\torch\lib\build\ATen\src\ATen\ATen.vcxproj] cl : Command line warning D9002: ignoring unknown option '-fPIC' [C:\Users\v-yuclin\workspace\pytorch\torch\lib\build\ATen\src\ATen\ATen.vcxproj] tmpxft_00003b14_00000000-8_THCTensorMathCompareTLong.cudafe1.gpu cl : Command line warning D9002: ignoring unknown option '-fexceptions' [C:\Users\v-yuclin\workspace\pytorch\torch\lib\build\ATen\src\ATen\ATen.vcxproj] cl : Command line warning D9002: ignoring unknown option '-fPIC' [C:\Users\v-yuclin\workspace\pytorch\torch\lib\build\ATen\src\ATen\ATen.vcxproj] tmpxft_00003b14_00000000-20_THCTensorMathCompareTLong.cudafe2.gpu cl : Command line warning D9002: ignoring unknown option '-fexceptions' [C:\Users\v-yuclin\workspace\pytorch\torch\lib\build\ATen\src\ATen\ATen.vcxproj] CUSTOMBUILD : nvcc warning : The -std=c++11 flag is not supported with the configured host compiler. Flag will be ignored. [C:\Users\v-yuclin\workspace\pytorch\torch\lib\build\ATen\src\ATen\ATen.vcxproj] cl : Command line warning D9002: ignoring unknown option '-fPIC' [C:\Users\v-yuclin\workspace\pytorch\torch\lib\build\ATen\src\ATen\ATen.vcxproj] tmpxft_00003b14_00000000-8_THCTensorMathCompareTLong.cudafe1.cpp THCTensorMathCompareTLong.cu cl : Command line warning D9002: ignoring unknown option '-fexceptions' [C:\Users\v-yuclin\workspace\pytorch\torch\lib\build\ATen\src\ATen\ATen.vcxproj] cl : Command line warning D9002: ignoring unknown option '-fPIC' [C:\Users\v-yuclin\workspace\pytorch\torch\lib\build\ATen\src\ATen\ATen.vcxproj]

@peterjc123  Thanks so much! Will that be soon?
Actually, I found that my building process falls into a loop: it is indeed running but it always shows the same stuff (warnings) again and again; I don't know if it is normal, or I did something wrong? (I did not use Ninja)
The same warning is like:
CUSTOMBUILD : nvcc warning : The -std=c++11 flag is not supported with the configured host compiler. Flag will be ignored. body:
@peterjc123  Thanks so much! Will that be soon? 

Actually, I found that my building process falls into a loop: it is indeed running but it always shows the same stuff (warnings) again and again; I don't know if it is normal, or I did something wrong? (I did not use Ninja) 

The same warning is like:

``
CUSTOMBUILD : nvcc warning : The -std=c++11 flag is not supported with the configured host compiler. Flag will be ignored. [C:\Users\v-yuclin\workspace\pytorch\torch\lib\build\ATen\src\ATen\ATen.vcxproj]

cl : Command line warning D9002: ignoring unknown option '-fPIC' [C:\Users\v-yuclin\workspace\pytorch\torch\lib\build\ATen\src\ATen\ATen.vcxproj]
